title: THE SMG4 ICEBERG: The Ultimate In Depth Dive Analysis

media:group.media:title: THE SMG4 ICEBERG: The Ultimate In Depth Dive Analysis
media:group.media:description:
This iceberg was created by Jako, and it’s pretty extraordinary. There’s a lot to talk about here over the 8 layers, and each layer is numbered from Tier 0 to Tier 7. Join myself and Ocerak, the hosts of tonight's show as we take the ultimate in depth dive into the SMG4 iceberg with special guest stars NEScRETRO, Harru, Natiscool, Big Marsh, and of course, Jako!

TIMESTAMPS
00:00 Intro
03:35 Tier 0 (Layer 1)
06:54 Tier 1 (Layer 2)
09:43 Tier 2 (Layer 3)
14:45 Tier 3 (Layer 4)
22:05 Tier 4 (Layer 5)
28:34 Tier 5 (Layer 6)
44:41 Tier 6 (Layer 7)
52:03 Tier 7 (Layer 8)
01:12:11 Outro
